description: "There are drawbridges being drawn up all over the world," Alex Allinson tells the Manx parliament.
title: Coronavirus: Manx students should 'come back now', advises education minister
title_page: Coronavirus: Manx students should 'come back now', advises education minister - BBC News
maintext: Dr Allinson said: "I'd like to appeal to those university students who are still in the UK, I know many of them are due to come back, my message would be to come back now.
